command.description: Combines and and minifies static resources for a website, storing them in the specified directory.

option.name: directory
option.description: Optional additional directory to search for dependency data files.

option.name: compile
option.description: Write compiled LESS files. See http://www.lesscss.org/.

option.name: clear
option.description: Clear the compiled directory of existing files.

option.name: verbose
option.description: Sets verbosity level. Use multiples for more detail (e.g. "-vv").

argument.name: webroot
argument.description: The directory to which files will be written.
